name: Camerupt
description: The Eruption Pokémon. Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon's back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.

abilities.name: Magma Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to freezing.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take any additional damage from a critical hit.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: After suffering a critical hit, this Pokémon doubles the damage dice for a single move it activates on the following turn.
